entry.title: Ptarmigan mainnet release
entry.summary: Hiroki from Nayuta team has released the mainnet version of their implementation named 'Ptarmigan'. This is considered as the fourth implementation of BOLT compliance. It is a reckless version, and users are advised to try this software with an amount they can afford to lose. The code can be accessed on GitHub via this link: https://github.com/nayutaco/ptarmigan
